mapper.insert: insert into machine_history(machine_code,operating_time, use_history, check_purpose, check_time, employee_no, machine_update, machine_update_date) values(#{machine_code},now(),'설치 후 작동 테스트', '설치 후 작동 점검',now() ,#{employee_no},'추가',now())
mapper.select: SELECT a.machine_code, a.machine_name, a.machine_status, b.name, a.purpose_of_use, a.machine_location, a.installation_date, c.machine_update_date FROM machine AS a JOIN member AS b ON a.employee_no = b.employee_no JOIN ( SELECT machine_code, MAX(machine_update_date) AS machine_update_date FROM machine_history WHERE machine_update != '삭제' GROUP BY machine_code ) AS c ON a.machine_code = c.machine_code WHERE a.machine_code NOT IN ( SELECT machine_code FROM machine_history WHERE machine_update = '삭제' ) LIMIT #{startPage},#{pageSize}

SELECT * FROM machine as a JOIN machine_history as b ON a.machine_code = b.machine_code join member as c on a.employee_no = c.employee_no where a.machine_code = #{machine_code} ORDER BY machine_update_date DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT a.machine_name, a.machine_code, c.name, b.use_history, b.operating_time, MAX(b.machine_update_date) AS machine_update_date, a.machine_status FROM machine AS a JOIN member AS c ON a.employee_no = c.employee_no JOIN ( SELECT machine_code, MAX(machine_update_date) AS machine_update_date, MAX(use_history) AS use_history, MAX(operating_time) AS operating_time FROM machine_history WHERE machine_update != '삭제' GROUP BY machine_code ) AS b ON a.machine_code = b.machine_code GROUP BY a.machine_code, a.machine_name, c.name, b.use_history, b.operating_time, a.machine_status ORDER BY CASE WHEN a.machine_status LIKE '%완료%' THEN 0 WHEN a.machine_status LIKE '%생산중%' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, CASE WHEN a.machine_status LIKE '%고장%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, a.machine_status LIMIT #{startPage},#{pageSize}
mapper.update: UPDATE machine_history SET machine_update = '삭제', machine_update_date = now() WHERE machine_code = #{machine_code} ORDER BY machine_update_date DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM machine WHERE machine_code > 0
